summary:
A rising leader who has successfully demonstrated the ability to work with the team and clients globally at all levels to bring best solution for complex problem resolution through thorough understanding of the current situation and futuristic approach. My curiosity and passion for sales & marketing, Business Development allow me to consistently stay informed on industry best practices and emerging market trends. My understanding on market & client requirements always put me in consultative selling and framing strategies for futuristic growth and new business line development. I have been told on numerous occasions that I am both hard working and a great executor.

My successful track record illustrates my ability to drive revenue growth and increase market share. I am an energetic and goal focused professional with skill sets ranging from consultative sales to achieving operational excellence.

Key sales areas handled : Small and Large molecules Drug Discovery and Development including Chemistry,  Medicinal chemistry, Synthetic chemistry, Analytical Chemistry etc, GLP & Non GLP Preclinical, Biology, Biologics, Bio pharma, Biosimilars, Cell Line Development, Clone development, Bioproduction, Protein production, Antibody Discovery, Upstream Process Development, Downstream Process Development, New Biological Entity, Formulation Development, GLP Toxicology, IND filing studies, in vitro and in vivo pharmacology, Efficacy studies, Process Research & Development, GMP/Non-GMP Manufacturing & Scale up, New Chemical Entity, Generic product development, in vitro Bioequivalence, in vitro BCS Biowaiver, complex generics, 505(b)(2)'s, CRO, CMO, CDMO, CRDO, CRAMS and IT/ITES sales, eCRF, EDC, eBMR, Consultative sales
